description: Schema for validating input JSON structure for audio file processing services.

data.description: Contains all data necessary for processing, specifically a list of audio files.

files.description: An array of file paths, each with a supported audio format.

items.description: A file path ending with a valid audio format extension.

service.description: Contains information about the service handling the files.

service_name.description: The name of the service processing the audio files.
